types:type.name: response
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type response = {| emp_id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, emp_name: String, emp_status: String |} {"example": "{\\\"emp_id\\\":1,\\\"emp_name\\\":\\\"\\\",\\\"emp_status\\\":\\\"\\\"}"}

types:type.name: responseArray
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type responseArray = Array<{| emp_id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, emp_name: String, emp_status: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"emp_id\\\":1,\\\"emp_name\\\":\\\"\\\",\\\"emp_status\\\":\\\"\\\"}]"}
